name: Renewal Of Life
description:
1. How is this game relevant to the theme? (Renewal)

By definition renewal means, "an instance of resuming something after an interruption." or ,"the replacement or repair of something". In this case it would be the second definition where our hero goes on a journey to repair himself and his relationships

2. What sort of experience/message are you hoping your game will bring across to the player?

No matter how bad a person gets it, they're still able to change and basically able to renew themselves into a better version of themselves

3. Why did you end up choosing the direction of your game?

We choose this because its a topic that isn't every discussed about and that we found interesting to make a game about and also because we had 6 different ideas that we couldn't agree on

- minor bugs regarding the sound. A prompt regarding the sound not working may appear. Just press retry as you play and it should be okay

Controls:

You'll find out in the game
